details.author: MainAgent
details.text:
Okay, based on the previous steps, the `WebSearchAnalyst` was able to find general news when searching for "today news," but it consistently failed to find relevant news about Samsung, returning irrelevant results with incorrect dates. This indicates that the search tool is functioning but not providing accurate results for specific company news.

I will now report this status to the user by posting a message to the Slack channel.
